keywords.indexterm: CSS Support in oXygen AuthorOxygen CSS extensions

conbody.p: CSS stylesheets provide support for displaying documents. When editing non-standard documents, CSS extensions are useful.
Examples of how they can be used:

ul.li: property for marking foldable elements in large files
enforcing a display mode for the XML tags, regardless of the current mode selected by the user
constructing a URL from a relative path location
